original_title: Sports Minister suspends governing bodies for 5 sports
original_body_lines: Sports Minister Harin Fernando has issued a special gazette notification, suspending the registration of the governing bodies for 5 sports in Sri Lanka.
Accordingly, the registration of the below-mentioned governing bodies has been suspended through the new communiqué, dated December 22, 2023:
The Sports Minister published the gazette notification by virtue of the powers vested in him under Sections 32 and 33 of the Sports Law, No.25 of 1973.

Additionally, Prof. (Rear Admiral) Shemal Fernando, the Director General of the Sports Development Department, was appointed as the ‘competent authority’ with effect from December 21, 2023, as a temporary measure to proceed with administrative and other required activities of these sports governing bodies, and to call and conduct relevant elections.
